name: Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc.
description: Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc. is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on healthcare properties, primarily in the skilled nursing and senior housing sectors. Established in 2010, Sabra's mission is to provide quality healthcare through strategic investments in real estate that support the facility operations of its tenants. The company’s portfolio consists of a diverse range of properties, including skilled nursing facilities, assisted living facilities, and other healthcare-related real estate. Sabra emphasizes its commitment to enhancing the quality of life for residents and patients by partnering with leading operators and healthcare providers. The company is recognized for its disciplined investment strategy, which includes both acquisitions and development of properties. With a focus on long-term growth and sustainability, Sabra is dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders while also contributing positively to the communities it serves. Sabra's management team is experienced in both healthcare and real estate, enabling the company to navigate the complexities of the healthcare industry effectively. The company is also committed to maintaining strong relationships with its tenants, ensuring that they have the resources and support needed to provide exceptional care.

seo.meta_title: Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc. | Leading Healthcare REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc., a premier real estate investment trust specializing in healthcare properties. Learn about our strategic investments and commitment to quality care.

faq.question: What does Sabra Health Care REIT do?
faq.answer: Sabra Health Care REIT invests in healthcare properties, focusing on skilled nursing and senior housing facilities.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sabra Health Care REIT?
faq.answer: Rick Matros is the CEO of Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Sabra Health Care REIT headquartered?
faq.answer: Sabra Health Care REIT is headquartered in San Diego, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Sabra own?
faq.answer: Sabra owns skilled nursing facilities, assisted living facilities, and other healthcare-related properties.

faq.question: When was Sabra Health Care REIT founded?
faq.answer: Sabra Health Care REIT was founded in 2010.
